They Come to Soften Hearts.--God will impress those whose hearts are open to truth, and who are longing for guidance. He will say to His human agent, 
                                                                           112
"Speak to this one or to that one of the love of Jesus." No sooner is the name of Jesus mentioned in love and tenderness than angels of God draw near, to soften and subdue the heart.--Manual for Canvassers, p. 37. (1902)
